issue.title: [C++] ScannerBuilder::Filter returns an error when given an augmented field
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16115](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16115). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to {{ScannerBuilder::Project}] we should consider augmented fields as viable options for filtering.
